AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States-Mexican border: geographical reference point relevant for roving border patrol stops and determining distance
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.location of the instant stop: place where Maria De Jesus Garcia's vehicle was stopped by border patrol agents, based on recent apprehensions of illegal alien smugglers in the area and suspicious behavior of the occupants
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Interstate Highway 35: common smuggling route with known alien smuggling activity where Maria De Jesus Garcia's vehicle was stopped
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.pickup truck: vehicle type involved in the incident, appeared heavily loaded with fogged-over windows and exhibited unusual behavior
